name: 19 Line
description:
19 LINE

A horror visual novel by Nico Saraintaris, Octavio Saraintaris & MakeRenders (Augusto Saraintaris + Francisco Araujo)

DISCLAIMER: The game is pretty long (yes, we've overscoped!) and it was originally written in Spanish.  ENGLISH VERSION IS ON THE WORKS.

---------

Pour us a coffee and we'll continue making narrative horror games!

---------

Features
  • Branching narrative with seven different endings.
  • Dark and gripping storytelling.
  • Gorgeous art by MakeRenders.
  • Original OST.
Platforms
  • Windows
  • Mac
Release Date

Coming Soon!
